Name: Meowlux Wish Coin
Description: Use the Wish Coin to perform a Wish draw. Rewards include limited edition mounts, outfits, accessories, design blueprints, dye materials, and a chance to receive Meowlux Guild's Premium Card and Privilege Card.
Description$english: Use the Wish Coin to perform a Wish draw. Rewards include limited edition mounts, outfits, accessories, design blueprints, dye materials, and a chance to receive Meowlux Guild's Premium Card and Privilege Card.
Description2$english: It is worth mentioning that the Meowlux Premium Card itself is a valuable item, allowing you to purchase seasonal outfits, jewelry, and specially customized hairstyles designed by the Guild's studios.
